name: PS-06-Voronoi-Flow_1000c
description: v4W.ENko - "PS-06-Voronoi-Flow_1000c". The Black&White  representation of the standard "Voronoi"  pattern realized in 2d. for the "Pattern`s standardisation" series - a collection of patterns realized with standard algorithmic structures of typical 2d procedural geometry. The "Voronoi" diagram is used to generate the layer of white cells according to the re-parametrization of the "Substrate" pattern. "Voronoi" cells are transformed in real-time. The "radius" parameter of the "voronoi diagram" is changing the value during the process according to the addition "perlin wave" function.  Slight offset is used to concentrate the radial gradation of "voronoi" with the number 14. The whole visualizations is forming abstract motion image. 1000 cells / random seed 4356.  Packed as GIF. 1024*1024px / 180 frames
